entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
